AI Description: vcf2tsvpy is a Python library for converting Variant Call Format (VCF) files into tab-separated values (TSV) files. It facilitates the conversion of genetic variant data stored in VCF format into a more easily accessible and analyzable TSV format.
Core Features: Conversion Of Vcf Files To Tsv Format, Support For Genetic Variant Data Processing, Written In Python For Ease Of Use & Integration In Python Workflows
General Tags: Python Library, Genetic Data Processing, Data Format Conversion
